name: Men's Ministry
description: Building strong men of faith who lead their families and serve the community with integrity.
quote: Be watchful, stand firm in the faith, act like men, be strong. Let all that you do be done in love. (1 Corinthians 16:13â€“14)

name: Women's Ministry
description: Empowering women to grow in grace, fellowship together, and make a difference in God's kingdom.
quote: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come. (Proverbs 31:25)

name: Youth Ministry
description: Inspiring the next generation to encounter God, build authentic relationships, and live out their faith.
quote: Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers. (1 Timothy 4:12)

name: Junior Youth Ministry
description: Guiding young teens to discover their identity in Christ and develop godly character through fellowship and biblical teaching.
quote: Remember your Creator in the days of your youth. (Ecclesiastes 12:1)

name: Children's Ministry
description: A fun and safe environment where kids learn about Jesus through Bible stories, songs, and play.
quote: Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them. (Mark 10:14)

name: Ushers Ministry
description: Ensuring a smooth and organized service experience by guiding congregation members and maintaining order in the house of God.
quote: For a day in your courts is better than a thousand elsewhere. I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God than dwell in the tents of wickedness. (Psalm 84:10)

name: Hospitality Ministry
description: Welcoming guests with a warm smile and demonstrating God's love through kindness and service to everyone who walks through our doors.
quote: Do not forget to show hospitality to strangers, for by so doing some have shown hospitality to angels without knowing it. (Hebrews 13:2)

name: Royal Queens
description: A special fellowship of women called to serve with dignity, grace, and spiritual excellence in God's kingdom.
quote: You are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation. (1 Peter 2:9)

name: Media Ministry
description: Using technology and creative arts to amplify the Gospel message through video, audio, and digital platforms.
quote: Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation. (Mark 16:15)

name: Evangelism Ministry
description: Reaching out to the lost with the life-changing message of Jesus Christ through community outreach and missions.
quote: How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news! (Romans 10:15)

name: Intercessory Prayer
description: Standing in the gap through fervent prayer, interceding for the church, community, and nations.
quote: The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective. (James 5:16)
